<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2691</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2691</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Comsoc: Laboratori de Física</string>
            <string language="en">Comsoc: Physics laboratory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Comsoc: Physiklabor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comsoc : Laboratoire de physique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comsoc: Laboratório da física</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comsoc: Laboratorio di fisica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Comsoc: Εργαστήριο φυσικής</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Col·lecció de recursos sobre Física distribuïts en cinc apartats: -Simulacions de cinemàtica, dinàmica, energia, electrostàtica, electrocinètica, electromagnetisme i ones.
-Glossari: termes i definicions de Física.
-Formulacions: recull de les fórmules més rellevants de la Física clàssica.
-Personatges: biografies dels científics més importants.
-Vincles: selecció de pàgines de física classificades per temes.</string>
            <string language="en">Selection of resources on physics in five sections:  Simulations of kinematics, dynamics, energy, electrostatics, electrokinetics, electromagnetism and waves;  Glossary of terms and definitions in physics;  Formulas: the most relevant formulas in traditional physics;  Biographies of outstanding scientists;  Links to webpages on physics, classified by subject matter.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">electricitat</string>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
            <string language="es">electricidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen magnètic</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">magnetisme</string>
            <string language="en">magnetism</string>
            <string language="es">magnetismo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">física</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
            <string language="es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen ondulatori</string>
            <string language="en">undulatory phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno ondulatorio</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswahl der Betriebsmittel auf Physik in fünf 
Kapiteln: - Simulationen von Kinematik, von Dynamik, von 
Energie, von Electrostatics, von electrokinetics, von 
Elektromagnetismus und von Wellen; - Glossar von Bezeichnungen 
und von Definitionen in der Physik; - Formeln: die 
relevantesten Formeln in der traditionellen Physik; - 
Biographien der hervorragenden Wissenschaftler; - Links zu den 
Webseiten auf der Physik, eingestuft durch Thema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sélection des ressources sur la physique dans 
cinq sections : - simulations de la cinématique, de la 
dynamique, de l'énergie, de l'electrostatics, de l'electrokinetics, 
de l'électromagnétisme et des vagues ; - glossaire des limites
et des définitions dans la physique ; - formules : les 
formules les plus appropriées dans la physique traditionnelle ; 
- biographies des scientifiques exceptionnels ; - liens 
aux pages Web sur la physique, classifiée par les thèmes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seleção dos recursos na física em cinco 
seções: - simulações do kinematics, da dinâmica, da 
energia, do electrostatics, do electrokinetics, do electromagnetism e 
das ondas; - glossário dos termos e das definições na 
física; - fórmulas: as fórmulas as mais relevantes na 
física tradicional; - biografias de cientistas proeminentes; 
- ligações aos Web pages na física, classificada pela 
matéria sujeita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Selezione delle risorse su fisica in cinque 
sezioni: - simulazioni di cinematica, di dynamics, di energia, 
di electrostatics, del electrokinetics, dell'elettromagnetismo e delle
onde; - glossario dei termini e delle definizioni nella fisica; 
- formule: le formule più relative nella fisica 
tradizionale; - biografie degli scienziati eccezionali; - 
collegamenti ai Web pagi su fisica, classificata per il tema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιλογή των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς στη φυσική σε 
πέντε τμήματα: - Προσομοιώσεις kinematics, της δυναμικής,
της ενέργειας, electrostatics, της ηλεκτροκινητικής, του 
ηλεκτρομαγνητισμού και των κυμάτων  - Γλωσσάρι των όρων και 
των ορισμών στη φυσική  - Τύποι: οι πιό σχετικοί 
τύποι στην παραδοσιακή φυσική  - Βιογραφίες των σημαντικών 
επιστημόνων  - Συνδέσεις με τα webpages στη φυσική, που 
ταξινομείται από το περιεχόμενο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisches Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetismus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">undulatory Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'électricité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomène magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">magnétisme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomène undulatory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">eletricidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômeno magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">magnetismo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômeno undulatory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">elettricità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fenomeno magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">magnetismo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fenomeno undulatory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό φαινόμενο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">undulatory φαινόμενο</string>
          </keyword>
